title: New: Amy Winehouse – Like Smoke (Feat. Nas)
body:
After the announcement concerning the posthumous release of a collection of unheard **Amy Winehouse** demos and covers a couple of weeks back, one track in particular stood out from the listing.

Not expecting to hear this track until the album release date of 5 December, it was a welcome surprise when [MissInfo.tv](http://www.missinfo.tv/index.php/nas-duets-with-the-late-amy-winehouse-on-like-smoke-hot97-premiere/) posted _Like Smoke (Feat. Nas)_ earlier today. As expected from Miss **Winehouse,** it’s a soulful number, although seemingly tragic in hindsight. Recorded back in 2008 and produced by close friend **Salaam Remi**, it was widely known that one of Amy’s life goals was to collaborate with the NY rapper, and Like Smoke is a fitting testament to a career untimely cut short. Check out _Like Smoke_ below.

  
  

_**Amy Winehouse Lioness: Hidden Treasures**_ is out 5 December, with £1 from each sale going to the Amy Winehouse Foundation.
